apple_vendor_description: This handshake emoji on Apple devices depicts two hands, one with a medium skin tone and the other with a light skin tone, clasped together in a gesture of agreement and partnership. Apple’s design language brings a tactile quality to the hands, with smooth gradients and realistic lighting highlighting the subtle curves and details of the fingers. It’s a universally understood symbol of cooperation, reconciliation, and successful negotiation, presented with Apple’s signature warmth and clarity.
